bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for a Metric Equipment Practice for Microcomputers
Convection-Cooled With 2 Mm Connectors
IEEE Standard for a Metric Equipment Practice for Microcomputers - Convection-Cooled With 2 Mm Connectors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Requirements are presented for subracks, plug-in units, printed boards, and backplanes to be used in conjunction with IEEE Std 1301-1991 and with a 2 mm connector as defined in EIA IS-64 (1991). The general arrangement, dimensions, and environmental requirements are covered. This standard may be used with other P1301.x connector implementations in the same subrack.<>

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
